thread.title: 'Thank god for that!' Kim Woodburn delights in 'two-faced battle-axe' Coleen Nolan's Loose Women break
thread.title_full: 'Thank god for that!' Kim Woodburn delights in 'two-faced battle-axe' Coleen Nolan's Loose Women break

author: Hayley Minn
title: 'Thank god for that!' Kim Woodburn delights in 'two-faced battle-axe' Coleen Nolan's Loose Women break
text:
Kim Woodburn is on today’s Loose Women . 
But viewers’ hopes of her being reunited with her Celebrity Big Brother arch-enemy Coleen Nolan were immediately dashed. 
Speaking to Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield on This Morning, the Loose Women ladies revealed the CBB winner was taking a break from presenting this week. 
And Kim said: “Thank god for that!” Read More Kim Woodburn revealed her true feelings about Coleen Nolan (Photo: ITV) Coleen Nolan is on a break from Loose Women (Photo: ITV) Much to the delight of Kim (Photo: ITV) 
But she wasn’t done there. 
The loud-mouthed woman added: “Two-faced battle-axe. 
“I haven’t started yet!” Read More Kim is going to go IN on Loose Women (Photo: ITV) 
The Loose Women also acknowledged the heated This Morning row between Kim and Phil. 
She called Phillip a “pot-stirrer”! 
It’s clear the How Clean Is Your House? host is set to be very opinionated on Coleen when it gets to her interview later. 
*Loose Women is on ITV1 weekdays at 12.30pm Like us on Facebook
